description: male figure wearing tan knickers, grey socks, greenish long coat and top hat, resting his head on his PL arm; no background differentiated
inscription:
Inscription

on back, in pencil: [By Joseph POWELL. / 141-19=26], [P] and [C82]; old mount, in graphite: [of item 112= part four]
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, July 19, 1973, no. 26; [Alister Matthews, Bournemouth; sold to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (until d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Resting Boy
